>
[Runtsage](/Feats.aspx?ID=5580) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions. You gain the [Adopted Ancestry](/Feats.aspx?ID=5115) general feat and must select [goblin](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4) as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level [goblin ancestry feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=618).
name: Runtsage
